resources.string: Updater
Update available
Install update

Update (%1$s) has been downloaded and is ready to install. Installation will take several minutes. All information on your phone will be saved. Your phone cannot be used during the install. Upon completion the phone will reboot and then function normally.

Your update is ready to be installed. \n\nInstallation takes several minutes. Your phone will not be usable during this process. Connect your phone to a power source to ensure you don\'t run out of battery power.
Please note, emergency calls cannot be made during the update. Press \"Install later\" to be reminded again in %1$d %2$s.
Press \"Install now\" to continue. Press \"Install later\" to delay the installation.
Do not have enough space for installation, please free some disk space!
MB
KB
A critical software update %1$s (%2$.1f %3$s) is available. Plug in the phone to ensure the battery is not drained during download. It is also recommended to download over 3G or WiFi.
A optional software update %1$s (%2$.1f %3$s) is available. Plug in the phone to ensure the battery is not drained during download. It is also recommended to download over 3G or WiFi.

A software update is available on your microSD card (version %1$s). 

In this step, you will copy the update to system memory. The update will be installed on the next step. 

Installation takes several minutes. Your phone will not be usable during this process. Connect your phone to a power source to ensure you don't run out of battery power.
hours
hour
minutes

Press \"Download\" to continue. All information on your phone will be saved. Press \"Later\" to be reminded in %1$d %2$s. \nTo check for updates at any time, press the Menu key -> Settings -> About Phone.

Press \"Download\" to continue. All information on your phone will be saved. Press \"Later\" to be reminded in %1$d %2$s. To skip this update press \"Cancel\". To check for updates at any time, press the Menu key -> Settings -> About Phone.
Press \"Copy\" to continue. Press \"Later\" to delay the installation. You will not be able to \"Cancel\" if you choose \"Copy\".\n
View release notes
Download
Copy
Cancel
Later

The OTA Package has been configured to Download Over Wi-Fi Only. 

Click below to enable a Wi-Fi Network and the download will initiate automatically.
Enable Wi-Fi Settings
Download using
Wi-Fi or Cellular Network
Wi-Fi only
- Data usage for OTA may apply towards your data plan limits in cellular network
- OTA download in cellular network may be deferred to offpeak hour between %1$s
- Go to Menu -> Settings -> Wireless & Networks to enable Wi-Fi
Continue
Install now
Install later
Battery level must be at least 15% to complete installation. \n\nPlease charge your phone to complete installation.
Update Status
The software update was successful!
The software update failed!
Your phone has been upgraded to %1$s version
Downloading updates
Copying update
Download will start in Wi-Fi/Off-peak hour
Download suspended. Will resume shortly ...
Enable Wi-Fi to start download update.
Download will resume in Wi-Fi coverage.
Verifying update ...
Info
Failed to download update because of insufficient system memory. \n\nPlease Factory Reset your device.
Failed to download update. The update package is not available at this time. \n\nNo further action is required.
Failed to download update. Unable to connect to the server. \n\nPlease try to update manually from the Menu key -> Settings -> About phone -> System updates.
The update could not be properly validated. Please try again.
Failed to update. The update version does not match your phone. \n\nPlease wait for the new update package.
Failed to update. The update version does not match your phone. \n\nPlease download the correct version for your phone and try again.
Failed to update. An unspecified error has occurred. \n\nPlease try again later.
Failed to update. Error reading from SD card. \n\nPlease download the package and try to copy again.
Failed to update. Error contacting DM server. Please try again later. \n\nPlease try to update manually from the Menu key -> Settings -> About phone -> System updates.
